scenario.name: UAC - call, send BYE
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[field1]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[field0]@[remote_ip]>;tag=uac[call_number] To: <sip:[field1]@[remote_ip]> Call-ID: call-[call_number]@[local_ip] CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=sipp 0 0 IN IP4 [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP4 [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio 5000 RTP/AVP 0 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000

ACK [last_Request-URI] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: [last_From:] To: [last_To:] Call-ID: [last_Call-ID] CSeq: 1 ACK Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0

BYE [last_Request-URI] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: [last_From:] To: [last_To:] Call-ID: [last_Call-ID] CSeq: 2 BYE Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0
